long-description.p: Penco's Vanguard series full door lockers are the gold standard of what it takes to withstand the daily use and abuse typically dealt to a locker. Vanguard's Knocked Down design made with strong 24-gauge steel offers superior security and durability where it matters most. Featuring a coat hook and shelf, they're the perfect choice for storing personal items at school or the office.
